name: Defenders (itch) (Bluewither)
description:
This is a game where you simply defend the big Square in the middle. Enemies will spawn periodically around the river and try to attack both you and the base. Currently, there are only 3 modes: Easy, Medium, and Hard, each with their own set of wave spawners and enemy counts. 

The game is my first project and I learned the basics of the game through a book that I was given as a gift.

I Hope you enjoy the game! Leave any feedback you'd like. However, this is no longer going to receive any updates due to me just wanting to have a fun little project to have.
